summary: AN ORDINANCE vacating a portion of Prospect Street on the petition of Koll Lake Union Associates, authorizing the purposes, accepting a Quit Claim Deed for street purposes and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement, authorizing the City to execute a Combined Sewer Relocation and Construction Agreement and transferring certain funds from the Drainage and Wastewater Fund to the General Fund equal to the vacation fee. (Comptroller File No. 297249.)
